Package com.paypal.merchant.sdk

Interface Summary
AuthenticationListener The AuthenticationListener notifies the calling application that the current service credentials are no longer valid.
CardReaderListener The CardReaderListener defines callbacks that will be invoked by the SDK to communicate
important events related to the Payment Readers.
The caller of CardReaderManager API may be required to provide a valid CardReaderListener
object to ensure that mandatory events are handled by the application.
CardReaderListener.CardReaderEvent When a Card Reader related event occurs your listeners will be passed an object of this type.
CardReaderManager CardReaderManager is the entry point for interacting with CardReaders used for
credit card processing.
The CardReaderManager lets the caller tap into feedback events from the underlying
Card Reader without having to worry about the finer details of how the card readers work.
Typically, application developers would want to tap into Card Reader related events together with
the TransactionManager related events to get more context.
CardReaderManager.ChipAndPinStatusResponse  
MerchantListener MerchantListener interface is useful for client apps that are interested in getting an updated
list of clients without having to explicitly ask for it.
To opt in into this feature, the application needs to initiate this mode by invoking the
registerMerchantListener and providing an instance of the MerchantListener interface.
If this listener is not installed, then the application determines changes to the checked in clients list
by using the getCheckedInClients API.
Sometimes, it is possible that some customers have been removed from the list and others added to the list
at the same time.
MerchantManager The MerchantManager is mainly meant to perform merchant related activities such as:
> Initialize the SDK with the merchant credentials that would be used while making all the backed calls.
> "Check-in" a merchant based on a geo location to accept customer "check-in" payments.
> "Check-out" the merchant if no more "check-in" related payments are accepted.
> Set the merchant logo for other "checked-in" clients to see.
> Remove the currently set merchant logo.
> Get a list of all the "checked-in" clients/customer around the merchant's location in order to accept payments.
TransactionController The TransactionController defines an interface that can be used by the application install a callback object that is used to customize behavior.
TransactionListener TransactionListener defines callbacks that will be invoked by the SDK to communicate important events related to the payment process.
TransactionListener.PaymentEvent PaymentEvent Currently only provides the event type.
TransactionManager Used to take payments, collect money, and process refunds.
TransactionManager.ChipAndPinAuthResponse Additional response data for chip&pin payment attempts
TransactionManager.PaymentResponse When making a finalizePayment call you'll eventually receive a response.
 

Class Summary
PayPalHereSDK The main object through which you can interact with PayPal Services and associated hardware devices
such as card readers and chip & pin devices.

There are three main APIs you can access:

CardReaderManager - Allows interaction with devices such as swipers and Bluetooth Chip & Pin devices
TransactionManager - Used to take payments, do refunds.
MerchantManager - Allows access of merchant info and discovering things like what users are checked
into your store and accepting payments from the same.

***** USING THE SDK *****

Here's how to quickly get up and running with the SDK:

1) Init the SDK:

Before using the PayPalHereSDK you must init it.
 

Enum Summary
CardReaderListener.CardErrors When dealing with cards we may encounter errors.
CardReaderListener.CardReaderEvents These are the events you might be sent.
CardReaderListener.ReaderConnectionTypes The ways in which we can currently connect to card readers.
CardReaderListener.ReaderTypes The current list of supported card reader types.
CardReaderManager.ChipAndPinStatusErrors The list of possible errors when initiating connection with a PayPal integrated Chip & Pin card reader
MerchantManager.MerchantErrors This enum consists of all the different error types that would be returned by the SDK through the response handlers while invoking the merchant manager APIs.
TransactionController.TransactionControlAction Enums that are used to control the workflow of the callback APIs
TransactionListener.PaymentEventType The Payment Events we'll send to the app.
TransactionManager.CancelPaymentErrors The list of possible errors you can receive when canceling a payment.
TransactionManager.PaymentErrors The list of possible errors you can receive when taking a payment.
TransactionManager.PaymentType When taking payment you can specify what type of payment you would like to make.
